relation: Everything in life is only for now
Tiny insects called the human race, lost in time, lost in space, and meaning
Our son will ride on the wheels of a dream
People will say we're in love
Do you hear the distant drums? It is the future that they bring when tomorrow comes!
And all shall know the wonder of purple summer
Let the sunshine in, the sunshine in
Being alive! Being alive! Being alive!
And happy ever after. I wish ...
Always look on the right side of life
Hail Malthus. Thank you and goodnight. That was our show!
In the circle, the circle of life
